/usr/bin/clang  -fPIC  -g -fno-inline -fno-strict-aliasing -Wno-unknown-attributes -Wno-unused-command-line-argument -Wno-unknown-warning-option -fPIC -fno-inline -fno-strict-aliasing -U_FORTIFY_SOURCE -rdynamic -Wl,--no-as-needed   -shared -Wl,-soname,libshadow-plugin-torctl.so -o libshadow-plugin-torctl.so shadow-plugin-torctl.hoisted.bc /home/tor/.shadow/lib/libglib-2.0.so /home/tor/.shadow/lib/libgthread-2.0.so /home/tor/.shadow/lib/libgmodule-2.0.so -Wl,-rpath,/home/tor/.shadow/lib:
